name: Bulbasaur
description: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seeds on its back in order to grow.

name: Ivysaur
description: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower’s coming bloom.

name: Venusaur
description: It is able to convert sunlight into energy. As a result, it is more powerful in the summertime.

name: Charmander
description: If it's healthy, the flame on the tip of its tail will burn vigorously, even if it gets a bit wet.

name: Charmeleon
description: If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.

name: Charizard
description: It uses its wings to fly high. The temperature of its fire increases as it gains experience in battle.

name: Squirtle
description: Shoots water at prey while in the water. Withdraws into its shell when in danger.

name: Wartortle
description: It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to maintain its balance while swimming.

name: Blastoise
description: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

name: Caterpie
description: If you touch the feeler on top of its head, it will release a horrible stink to protect itself.

name: Metapod
description: Hardens its shell to protect itself. However, a large impact may cause it to pop out of its shell.

name: Butterfree
description: It loves the honey of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.

name: Weedle
description: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.

name: Kakuna
description: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.

name: Beedrill
description: It can take down any opponent with its powerful poison stingers. It sometimes attacks in swarms.

name: Pidgey
description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

name: Pidgeotto
description: It flies over its wide territory in search of prey, downing it with its highly developed claws.

name: Pidgeot
description: It spreads its beautiful wings wide to frighten its enemies. It can fly at Mach 2 speed.

name: Rattata
description: Cautious in the extreme, its hardy vitality lets it live in any kind of environment.

name: Raticate
description: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.

name: Spearow
description: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.

name: Fearow
description: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.

name: Ekans
description: A very common sight in grassland, etc. It flicks its tongue in and out to sense danger in its surroundings.

name: Arbok
description: The pattern on its belly appears to be a frightening face. Weak foes will flee just at the sight of the pattern.

name: Pikachu
description: It keeps its tail raised to monitor its surroundings. If you yank its tail, it will try to bite you.

name: Raichu
description: When its electricity builds, its muscles are stimulated, and it becomes more aggressive than usual.

name: Sandshrew
description: It burrows and lives underground. If threatened, it curls itself up into a ball for protection.

name: Sandslash
description: Adept at climbing trees, it rolls into a spiny ball, then attacks its enemies from above.

name: Nidoran (F)
description: The poison hidden in its small horn is extremely potent. Even a tiny scratch can have fatal results.

name: Nidorina
description: When feeding its young, it first chews the food into a paste, then spits it out for the offspring.

name: Nidoqueen
description: It uses its scaly, rugged body to seal the entrance of its nest and protect its young from predators.

name: Nidoran (M)
description: It is small, but its horn is filled with poison. It charges then stabs with the horn to inject poison.

name: Nidorino
description: Its horns contain venom. If they are stabbed into an enemy, the impact makes the poison leak out.

name: Nidoking
description: One swing of its mighty tail can snap a telephone pole as if it were a matchstick.

name: Clefairy
description: The moonlight that it stores in the wings on its back apparently gives it the ability to float in midair.

name: Clefable
description: Its very sensitive ears lets it distinguish distant sounds. As a result, it prefers quiet places.

name: Vulpix
description: While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted.

name: Ninetales
description: Its nine tails are said to be imbued with a mystic power. It can live for a thousand years.

name: Jigglypuff
description: Looking into its cute, round eyes causes it to sing a relaxing melody, inducing its enemies to sleep.

name: Wigglytuff
description: Its fur is extremely fine, dense, and supple. The exquisitely pleasant fur conveys an image of luxury.

name: Zubat
description: Capable of flying safely in dark places, it emits ultrasonic cries to check for any obstacles.

name: Golbat
description: Once it starts sucking blood, it does not stop until it is full. It flies at night in search of prey.

name: Oddish
description: Awakened by moonlight, it roams actively at night. In the day, it stays quietly underground.

name: Gloom
description: The honey it drools from its mouth smells so atrocious, it can curl noses more than a mile away.

name: Vileplume
description: Its petals are the largest in the world. As it walks, it scatters extremely allergenic pollen.

name: Paras
description: As its body grows, large mushrooms named tochukaso start sprouting out of its back.

name: Parasect
description: A mushroom grown larger than the host’s body controls Parasect. It scatters poisonous spores.

name: Venonat
description: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats bugs. It is attracted by light at night.

name: Venomoth
description: It flutters its wings to scatter dustlike scales. The scales leach toxins if they contact skin.

name: Diglett
description: Its skin is very thin. If it is exposed to light, its blood heats up, causing it to grow weak.

name: Dugtrio
description: Its three heads move alternately, driving it through tough soil to depths of over 60 miles.

name: Meowth
description: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.

name: Persian
description: The gem in its forehead glows on its own! It walks with all the grace and elegance of a proud queen.

name: Psyduck
description: If its usual headache worsens, it starts exhibiting odd powers. It can’t remember doing so, however.

name: Golduck
description: When it swims at full speed using its long, webbed limbs, its forehead somehow begins to glow.

name: Mankey
description: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment, then thrashing away the next instant.

name: Primeape
description: It becomes wildly furious if it even senses someone looking at it. It chases anyone that meets its glare.

name: Growlithe
description: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.

name: Arcanine
description: Its proud and regal appearance has captured the hearts of people since long ago.

name: Poliwag
description: Its skin is so thin, its internal organs are visible. It has trouble walking on its newly grown feet.

name: Poliwhirl
description: The spiral pattern on its belly subtly undulates. Staring at it gradually causes drowsiness.

name: Poliwrath
description: With its extremely tough muscles, it can keep swimming in the Pacific Ocean without resting.
